title: Thick Letterpress Slab-Serif..but anything like it in digital world?
content:
I love this type! Is their a digital copy?

| --- | --- |

Tim

Not exactly the same thing, but rather delicious :  
try ziggurat…

[http://www.typography.com/catalog/ziggurat/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005327/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/ziggurat/index.html "http://www.typography.com/catalog/ziggurat/index.html")

pete

oh yes, you might look out Giza too…

pete

Rosewood Fill - not as bold but similar in feel I think.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rosewood/fill/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rosewood/fill/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rosewood/fill/")

The work is by Kent Henderson (client - Kultbox Records)

His website:  
www[.]kenthenderson[.]com
Love the name and the look of Ziggurat!
